name: Eleven (itch)
description:
Play as Eleven on a journey out of the Upside Down dimension. Collect Eggos to recharge your moves and beat Demo-dogs to clear your way to the portal.

Controls

  • Moving - Mouse and LMB or Arrow keys
  • Restart a level - R key
  • Music on/off - M key
  • Quit the game - Esc key

Disclaimer

This short puzzle game is a tribute to the great Netflix show Stranger Things. The creator of this game owns NO right to the original material on which this fan game is based on. This game is also free and does NOT generate any revenue.

Made by Waldemar Umaniz (@wowa_u)
